subject: Pics
body:
Hire,
i am herae sitting in the internet caffe. Found your email !and
decided to write. I might be coming to your place in 14 days, 
so I decided to email you. May be we can meeta? I aam 25 y.o.
girl. I have a picture if you want. No need to reply here as 
this is not m!y email. !Write me at wfoug@MailVisionWorld.info
